explanations.Large Language Model: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Large Language Models (LLMs) for automating security-focused test case generation for APIs.
explanations.LLM: This is an abbreviation for Large Language Model, which is a core component of the framework described in the paper.
explanations.LLaMA: The paper specifically evaluates the performance of Llama 3 8B, which is a variant of the LLaMA model family, in the context of their framework.
